item.title: Stylized Linear Gradients
item.description: AuthorAlessa "Codekitten" Baker Page StatusComplete Unreal VersionNA Note This article was originally written for 80.lvl, thank you for hosting my little tutorial! This tutorial is to teach you the basics of creating that stylized linear gradient seen in games like DOTA and League of Legends. Weâ€™ll be focusing mostly on learning World Position, Object Position and Object Radius. These three nodes combined will allow us to achieve the effect we need.
